definition: having pathetic as well as ludicrous characteristics
details:
adjective
- having pathetic as well as ludicrous characteristics
= example: having pathetic as well as ludicrous characteristics
= synonyms: tragicomical
- manifesting both tragic and comic aspects
= example: manifesting both tragic and comic aspects
= synonyms: tragicomical
- of or relating to or characteristic of tragicomedy
= example: of or relating to or characteristic of tragicomedy
